product_queries.name: Products by category
product_queries.description: Get product count and avg price per category
product_queries.sql: SELECT pc.name, COUNT(pt.id) as count, AVG(pt.list_price) as avg_price FROM product_template pt JOIN product_category pc ON pt.categ_id = pc.id GROUP BY pc.name ORDER BY count DESC

product_queries.name: Active products with stock
product_queries.description: Products that are active and have stock > 0
product_queries.sql: SELECT pt.name, pt.list_price, sq.quantity FROM product_template pt JOIN product_product pp ON pp.product_tmpl_id = pt.id JOIN stock_quant sq ON sq.product_id = pp.id WHERE pt.active = true AND sq.quantity > 0

product_queries.name: Product custom fields
product_queries.description: Products with their custom studio fields
product_queries.sql: SELECT name, x_studio_style_reference, x_studio_color_reference, x_studio_country_of_origin_1 FROM product_template WHERE active = true

sales_queries.name: Monthly sales summary
sales_queries.sql: SELECT TO_CHAR(date_order, 'YYYY-MM') as month, COUNT(*) as orders, SUM(amount_total) as revenue FROM sale_order WHERE state IN ('sale', 'done') GROUP BY month ORDER BY month

sales_queries.name: Top customers by revenue
sales_queries.sql: SELECT rp.name, COUNT(so.id) as orders, SUM(so.amount_total) as total FROM sale_order so JOIN res_partner rp ON so.partner_id = rp.id WHERE so.state IN ('sale', 'done') GROUP BY rp.name ORDER BY total DESC LIMIT 50

sales_queries.name: Sales by product category
sales_queries.sql: SELECT pc.name, SUM(sol.price_subtotal) as revenue, SUM(sol.product_uom_qty) as qty FROM sale_order_line sol JOIN product_product pp ON sol.product_id = pp.id JOIN product_template pt ON pp.product_tmpl_id = pt.id JOIN product_category pc ON pt.categ_id = pc.id JOIN sale_order so ON sol.order_id = so.id WHERE so.state IN ('sale', 'done') GROUP BY pc.name ORDER BY revenue DESC

inventory_queries.name: Current stock by location
inventory_queries.description: Stock levels grouped by warehouse location
inventory_queries.sql: SELECT sl.complete_name, COUNT(sq.id) as items, SUM(sq.quantity) as total_qty FROM stock_quant sq JOIN stock_location sl ON sq.location_id = sl.id WHERE sq.quantity > 0 GROUP BY sl.complete_name ORDER BY total_qty DESC

inventory_queries.name: Out of stock products
inventory_queries.description: Active products with zero or negative stock
inventory_queries.sql: SELECT pt.name, COALESCE(SUM(sq.quantity), 0) as stock FROM product_template pt JOIN product_product pp ON pp.product_tmpl_id = pt.id LEFT JOIN stock_quant sq ON sq.product_id = pp.id WHERE pt.active = true GROUP BY pt.name HAVING COALESCE(SUM(sq.quantity), 0) <= 0

customer_queries.name: Customer distribution by country
customer_queries.sql: SELECT rc.name, COUNT(rp.id) as customers FROM res_partner rp JOIN res_country rc ON rp.country_id = rc.id WHERE rp.customer_rank > 0 GROUP BY rc.name ORDER BY customers DESC

customer_queries.name: VIP customers
customer_queries.sql: SELECT rp.name, rp.email, COUNT(so.id) as orders, SUM(so.amount_total) as lifetime_value FROM res_partner rp JOIN sale_order so ON so.partner_id = rp.id WHERE so.state IN ('sale', 'done') GROUP BY rp.name, rp.email HAVING COUNT(so.id) >= 5 ORDER BY lifetime_value DESC LIMIT 100

accounting_queries.name: Invoice summary by type
accounting_queries.description: Count and total by move type
accounting_queries.sql: SELECT move_type, state, COUNT(*) as count, SUM(amount_total) as total FROM account_move GROUP BY move_type, state ORDER BY move_type, state
